short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AudioVibe Visuals is a music visualizer offering different styles and color customizations to be displayed on any site playing audio

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the extension popup to select between different styles and create custom color palettes or try some of the default ones. Use any of your favorite music listening sites! Visuals have been optimized for placement on YouTube Music, Spotify, and SoundCloud, but will work on any website.

Features:
- Create a custom color palette up to 100 colors
- Save up to 50 custom color palettes
- Enjoy these available visualizers: Frequency Bars, Circular Frequency Bars, Radial Bars, Radial Bars Extended and Retro Bars

Visit www.audiovisualizer.app for help and information on how to use the extension, or reach out to the developer with requests and issues.
